raw_text: GOMES – MIGNONNE (nee RASQUINHO) – It is with heavy hearts and profound sadness that we announce the passing of MIGNONNE GOMES (nee RASQUINHO). Dearly beloved wife of Muni (Rtd. DIG of Police),​ loving mother of Ravi (ex-SriLankan Airlines) and Sandra Gomes,​ Sonali and Rumesh Ratnayake,​ cherished grandmother of Deandra and Kamila Waidyaratne,​ Sheraiah and James Medara,​ Rahil and Nadia Gomes,​ Kalisha and Reshaiah Ratnayake,​ adoring great-grandmother to Judah Medara,​ beloved sister of the late Girla,​ Mervyn,​ Felicia,​ Tilbert & Vally and of Iona,​ Mary and Rita. Her mortal remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from Thursday 20th July 2023 from 10.00 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves parlour at 2.30 p.m. on Friday,​ 21st for cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 3.00 p.m. (Old Crematorium). She spent a lifetime of love and devotion to all her loved ones and was the life and soul of her home. Her place can never be filled. May she rest in eternal peace with our Lord in Heaven.044761

JOE (NAGE) VICTORIA – It is with profound sadness that we announce the death of JOE (NAGE) VICTORIA. Beloved husband of Swarna (deceased) and son Luckshan (deceased),​ loving brother of Selve,​ Mirani,​ late Raj,​ Wije,​ Mahe and Agnes. Remains lie at Western Florists Funeral Parlour,​ Negombo on 22nd July from 8.30 a.m. to 3.30 p.m. Burial on the 22nd July at Raddoluwa Cemetery at 4.30 p.m.044987
